0000001.description: These resources were listed in "Sharing biological data: why, when, and how", which prompted further novel curation of the Bioregistry which included the addition of GenBank, Panorama Public, EMPIAR, and SSBD. It also prompted the curation of mappings to FAIRSharing when possible.
0000001.name: Resources mentioned in "Sharing biological data: why, when, and how"
